Class AbstractLocalSearchActivity<T>

java.lang.Object

                          com.jdroid.android.activity.AbstractListActivity<T>
                              com.jdroid.android.activity.AbstractSearchActivity<T>
                                  com.jdroid.android.activity.AbstractLocalSearchActivity<T>
Type Parameters:
T - An item in the list. The filtering will be done based on T#toString().
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemClickListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnActionModeFinishedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnActionModeStartedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnCreatePanelMenuListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnMenuItemSelectedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnPreparePanelListener, ActivityIf, FragmentIf, SearchResult.SortingListener<T>, DefaultUseCaseListener, roboguice.util.ScopedObjectMapProvider
public abstract class AbstractLocalSearchActivity<T>
extends AbstractSearchActivity<T>

Search activity that performs the search only once, when the activity is created, and has the ability to filter thereafter.

Author:
Estefania Caravatti
